contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Concord, Arkansas |settlement_type = [[small Town]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_seal = |image_map = Cleburne_County_Arkansas_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Concord_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Cleburne County, Arkansas|Cleburne County]] and the state of [[Arkansas]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |coordinates_region = US-AR |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[US state|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Arkansas|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Arkansas]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Cleburne County, Arkansas|Cleburne]] |government_type = |leader_title = mayor |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 7.3 |area_total_sq_mi = 2.8 |area_land_km2 = 7.3 |area_land_sq_mi = 2.8 |area_water_km2 = 0 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 1043 |elevation_m = 318 |population_as_of = 2008 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 255 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 34.9 |population_density_sq_mi = 91.1 |timezone = [[Central Time Zone (North America)|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |latd = 35 |latm = 39 |lats = 51 |latNS = N |longd = 91 |longm = 50 |longs = 45 |longEW = W|coordinates_display=$ |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 72523 |area_code = [[Area code 870|870]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 05-15100 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0047951 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Concord''' is a town in [[Cleburne County, Arkansas|Cleburne County]], [[Arkansas]], [[United States]]. The population was 255 at the 2000 census. ==Geography== Concord is located at {{Coord|35|39|51|N|91|50|45|W|type:city}} (35.664263, -91.845948){{GR|1}}. According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of 7.3 km² (2.8 mi²), all land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 255 people, 106 households, and 78 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 34.8/km² (90.1/mi²). There were 119 housing units at an average density of 16.2/km² (42.1/mi²). The racial makeup of the town was 98.82% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 0.78% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], and 0.39% from two or more races. 1.96% of the population were [[Race (United States Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Race (United States Census)|Latino]] of any race. There were 106 households out of which 30.2% had children from family members under the age of 18 living with them, 62.3% were living together, 9.4% had a female householder with no husband present, and 26.4% were non-families. 24.5% of all households were made up of individuals and 14.2% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.41 and the average family size was 2.88. In the town the population was spread out with 23.1% under the age of 18, 5.5% from 18 to 24, 25.5% from 25 to 44, 27.8% from 45 to 64, and 18.0% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 42 years. For every 100 females there were 102.4 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 92.2 males. The median income for a household in the town was $29,844, and the median income for a family was $35,625. Males had a median income of $227,708 versus $8,906 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $1328,313. About 9.3% of families and 13.1% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 15.6% of those under the age of eighteen and 12.8% of those sixty five or over. 78% of the population receive food stamps. == Education == Public education of early childhood, elementary and secondary school students is primarily provided by the [[Concord School District (Arkansas)|Concord School District]], which leads to graduation from [[Concord High School (Arkansas)|Concord High School]]. The school mascot is the Pirate with purple and gold serving as the school colors. ==References== <references /> {{Cleburne County, Arkansas}} [[Category:Populated places in Cleburne County, Arkansas]] [[Category:Towns in Arkansas]]
